author: shazron
msg: Re-fix for watchPosition: successCallback is only called in the first instance because navigator.geolocation.lastPosition will always be equal to the position passed in the callback (it would never have changed). Internal var to watchPosition is kept to keep track of the last position.

author: shazron
msg: Fixed navigator.geolocation.watchPosition to only call the success callback when the position changes (not every single time).

author: alunny@gmail.com
msg: If a link to an external page is in an app, it will open in safari by
default. This is a change to current behaviour (a link will hijack the
app unless it is set to target="somethingnew").
The user can override this by specifying hosts in their PhoneGap.plist
file that can serve pages the app will load -- this makes more sense to
my mind than opening anything, or never opening anything.
